shape.name: Token Shape
shape.hint: What shape the token should be considered as when snapping.

sticky.name: Sticky Keys
sticky.hint: When enabled movement using the keyboard keys will result in colliding tokens sticking to each other instead of glancing or bouncing off.

wall-snap.name: Wall Snap
wall-snap.hint: When enabled tokens will also snap to walls.

tmp.name: Toggle Grid on Current Layer (Global)
tmp.hint: Short Press will toggle the layer globally, a long press will toggle the layer just for the current Scene.
